parametrized_description: A fishing boat transports fish to shore using canoes and diesel boats. Each canoe can carry CanoeCapacity fish, and each diesel boat can carry DieselBoatCapacity fish. The number of canoes used must be at least CanoeToBoatRatio times the number of diesel boats used. To transport at least MinFish fish, minimize the total number of canoes and diesel boats required.

CanoeCapacity.description: Number of fish that a canoe can carry

DieselBoatCapacity.description: Number of fish that a small diesel boat can carry

CanoeToBoatRatio.description: Minimum ratio of canoes to diesel boats

MinFish.description: Minimum number of fish to be transported to shore

NumberOfDieselBoats.description: The number of diesel boats used

constraints.description: Each canoe can carry CanoeCapacity fish and each diesel boat can carry DieselBoatCapacity fish. The total number of fish transported must be at least MinFish.
The number of canoes used must be at least CanoeToBoatRatio times the number of diesel boats used.

objective.description: Minimize the total number of canoes and diesel boats required.
